Acute BAF perturbation causes immediate changes in chromatin accessibility

item.title: Protein identification from Gels
item.description: Do you want to know which proteins are present in your SDS-PAGE gel bands? Just cut out the band of interest from your Coomassie or silver-stained gel and hand it over to us! We have all protocols at hand to perform in-gel digestion LC-MS/MS analysis. In order to minimize contamination issues, please consult our detailed recommendation under sample submission.

item.title: Qualitative Profiling
item.description: We perform analysis either in a one dimensional (1D) single injection or two dimensional (2D) multiple injection LC-MS/MS depending on the expected protein amount and complexity in the sample. 1D and 2D workflows provide the highest flexibility regarding proteome coverage and cost control. We offer different choices in standardized gradient lengths (60- 240 min) and number of fractions (12-36 x 120 min). For offline fractionation of peptides, we use the commonly established basic-pH reversed phase chromatography together with concatenated pooling strategy prior to LC-MS analysis.
